pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gavv (2024, TV show)$(br)Health: 100

Has a 5% chance to spawn from an $(l:gavv/mobs/agent)Agent$(/l)$(br2)Special moves:$(li)Uses his $(l:gavv/riders/bitter_gavv#marble_breacookie)Marble Breacookie$(/l) form at under 75 health if you have $(l:gavv/items/mimic_keys#nyelv_mimic_key)Nyelv's Mimic Key$(/l) in your inventory$(br2)Drops$(li)3-5 $(l:gavv/items/blank_gochizo)Blank Gochizos$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:gavv/items/gochizo#sparkingummy_gochizo)Sparkingummy Gochizo$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:gavv/items/gochizo#breacookie_gochizo)Breacookie Gochizo$(/l) (16.7%)$(li)1 $(l:gavv/items/gochizo#vrocanspicy_gochizo)Vrocan Spicy Gochizo$(/l) (16.7%)$(li)1 $(l:gavv/items/gochizo#bakibakistick_gochizo)Bakibaki Stick Gochizo$(/l) (8.3%)$(li)1 $(l:gavv/items/gochizo#chocold_gochizo)Chocold Gochizo$(/l) (8.3%)$(li)1 $(l:gavv/items/gochizo#marble_breacookie_gochizo)Marble Breacookie Gochizo$(/l) (if you have $(l:gavv/items/mimic_keys#nyelv_mimic_key)Nyelv's Mimic Key$(/l) in your inventory)
